name: Connected (IrememberDFG)
description:
The controls are WASD.

The Goal of the game is to flip over tile once with no back tracking. Although, you may backtrack on the finish, which is needed for a few levels. 

I guess I miss understood the theme a little bit and went with connected, not connection, oh well at this point.

This project and feedback will be submitted my school as a project so add as much CONSTRUSTIVE feedback as possible please!

Unfortunately, My WebGl build kept crashing so right now the game is only available via download on Windows. Check back for changes.

Please follow me on Social as I get more into game design:

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/devfiregrasp

Twitter: https://twitter.com/DevFireGrasp
